list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor documentation and improve function clarity.
Enhanced the docstrings for better readability and consistency. Created `print_pokemons_infos()` function to separate concerns from the `main()` function, which now solely handles execution logic.

task.summary:
Add new user authentication module
Implement a new module for user authentication, including login and registration functionalities. This module uses secure hashing for passwords and includes basic validation checks for user inputs.

Add function to retrieve total number of Pokémon
Introduced `get_pokemons_count` function to fetch and return the total number of Pokémon from the PokeAPI. This helps enhance functionality, allowing us to dynamically get the count of Pokémon instead of relying on a hardcoded value.

Refactor Pokémon fetching and printing logic
Simplified functions for fetching and printing Pokémon data to improve clarity and maintainability. Introduced new helper functions to modularize code and updated documentation for better understanding.

Refactor documentation and improve function clarity.
Enhanced the docstrings for better readability and consistency. Created `print_pokemons_infos()` function to separate concerns from the `main()` function, which now solely handles execution logic.

MESSAGE.value:
Add new user authentication module
Implement a new module for user authentication, including login and registration functionalities. This module uses secure hashing for passwords and includes basic validation checks for user inputs.

Add function to retrieve total number of Pokémon
Introduced `get_pokemons_count` function to fetch and return the total number of Pokémon from the PokeAPI. This helps enhance functionality, allowing us to dynamically get the count of Pokémon instead of relying on a hardcoded value.

Refactor Pokémon fetching and printing logic
Simplified functions for fetching and printing Pokémon data to improve clarity and maintainability. Introduced new helper functions to modularize code and updated documentation for better understanding.

Refactor documentation and improve function clarity.
Enhanced the docstrings for better readability and consistency. Created `print_pokemons_infos()` function to separate concerns from the `main()` function, which now solely handles execution logic.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
